title: Spectra of $\Lambda$ and $\Sigma$ Baryons under Screened Potential
abstract:
The light, strange baryons have been studied through various approaches and
attempted to be looked for rigorously in experiments. The screened potential
has been applied to heavy baryon sector as well as meson systems in earlier
works. Here, this article attempts to compare the results for linear and
screened potential for light strange baryons. Also, the Regge trajectories
depict the linear nature.
